name: Over The Moonlight - Playground
description:
Pick the Flowers you like and paint what you want on the canvas. 

This version is only a preview of the full game, releasing on itch & Steam in about two weeks (15/09/17) for free. The Playground only features one kind of island where you can pick flowers & paint with them. There is no story or travelling to other islands in this version.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/692270/Over_The_Moonlight/ if you want to add it to your wishlist!

We are releasing this version to get more feedback on our painting mechanic, don't hesitate to give us yours!

+++
by @IronEqualMusic: RADIANT.prk
